text: Shiwabalola Abandu abakhongo mubana ba Israili, Musa niyakharulao, olwababoolela Omurumwa wabu mbu; “khurererekhwo Omwami kho khulwaane khunjila ya Nyasaye” Noboola “koo kalaba mbu nimulomesibwa okhupana mulakhaya?” Nibaboola mbu “bilaba birie khulalwana khunjila ya Nyasaye tawe, ne khulondelwe mutsingo tsiefu nende Abaana befu?” Halali olwa balachilwa okhulwana bakalukhana, halali batiti mubo, Ne Nyasaye yamanya abamabii
